title: UPDATE: T206 Lajoie with bat Polar Bear
author: vintagetoppsguy

posts.post_title: UPDATE: T206 Lajoie with bat Polar Bear
posts.post_content: I purchased this card as a SGC 50 (4), but cracked it out.  I just enjoy them much better raw.  If you have access to VCP, you can probably find the sale and even match the tobacco stains, it was within the last couple years.  I paid $500.  Willing to sell for $400 PP F&F (or add 3% for regular PP).  I think I may still have the flip (not sure), but I'll certainly include it if I do.  Please do not contact me and ask me if I am willing to sell for less.  This is my rock bottom price.  Thanks for looking.
After looking at VCP, I realize I only paid $400 for the card (for some reason I was thinking $500).  Will sell for $325.
